resources.string: At Unwind, we get it. Sometimes life gets too much. More and more of us are busy, stressed and anxious. It is important to unwind - hence our name.

Unwind is here to help you take five during your busy day, and you can make of it what you want. It can be a daily journal of what is troubling you, and offer you guidance on what to do about it. That might be a meditation exercise, or just helping you plan your week. You can also ask us where to find help locally.
Privacy is important to us. Anything you share with our bot is completely confidential to you. We will not share any of your information.
